sentence: A great part was the social activities in the early evening in the lobby
It was very clean and it was close to all the activities we had planned
This hotel offered a great location in which to start all your tourist activities from
Summing up in 3 words the best bits LOCATIONS STAFF GYM
Perfect location to FW activities
This hotel is very convenient to the Wharf and tourist activities
They also have an agreement with 24hr fitness next door and I had a GREAT workout
Easily walked to the Wharf that provided many good restaurants and activities to partake in
It is close to pier activities and a short car ride or public transit hop to other major attractions
Very convenient to Wharf and activity
Construction activity and noise was present all day
I suppose we could have waved our arms every 30 minutes and gotten some exercise but by 10 at night the problem still was not fixed and we were moved to another room
did not take advantage of gym or other things covered so it seemed a bit steep
I would have given it a five star if not for the fact that we were not told of the existence of a gym when we checked in only heard it on our last day we stayed 8 nights
Also included was unlimited access to a nearby gym but not everyone wants this facility especially a 67 year old senior
Be aware that the hotel charges a non negotiable urban amenity fee for wifi flavored water and use of the exercise facility across the street

To make up for their lack of a gym they will give you a pass at a nearby 24Hour fitness club but who wants to go out in cold weather in their gym clothes just to use a third rate health club like 24Hour
They do not care how important your ID is to your planned vacation activities
There is an extra charge of 300 a day for gym amenity WE NEVER USED NO BUSINESS CENTER
Daily resort fee 30 is compulsory we do not use the gym so the only benefit To us was basic Wifi
